statements: SELECT * FROM digital_identities;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM digital_identities WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT first_name, last_name, created_at FROM digital_identities WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM digital_identities ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM digital_identities WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, created_at FROM digital_identities ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, updated_at FROM digital_identities WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM digital_identities WHERE blockchain_hash LIKE 'abc%' AND first_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, updated_at FROM digital_identities WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND updated_at < '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, blockchain_hash FROM digital_identities WHERE blockchain_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM digital_identities;
SELECT id, identity_hash FROM digital_identities ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id = 10;
SELECT identity_id, data FROM blockchain_data WHERE transaction_id = 100 ORDER BY identity_id ASC;
SELECT block_id, transaction_id FROM blockchain_data WHERE identity_id = 5 AND transaction_id > 50 ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_identities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT identity_hash FROM digital_identities WHERE id > 5;
SELECT block_id, transaction_id, identity_id, data FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id < 100;
SELECT identity_hash FROM digital_identities WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE identity_id = 2 ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_accounts ORDER BY account_created_at DESC;
SELECT account_address, account_balance FROM blockchain_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, account_address, account_balance FROM blockchain_accounts WHERE account_balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY account_address ASC;
SELECT * FROM identity_information WHERE identity_verified = true;
SELECT user_id, log_time, log_action, log_description FROM authentication_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_address FROM blockchain_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM identity_information WHERE identity_verified = true AND identity_dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM blockchain_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE log_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT identity_id, user_id, identity_name, identity_verified FROM identity_information WHERE identity_verified = false ORDER BY identity_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM digital_identities WHERE user_id = 'c4618168-6d79-474b-9d2f-4c5efb43d7e6';
SELECT id, blockchain_address FROM digital_identities ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, public_key FROM digital_identities WHERE blockchain_address = '0x7a2b780348fc3EB1e3B8735985c171F70111Cf42';
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT log_id, event FROM authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 'a2f9c0cf-63b8-478b-bd2c-a77a6821b520' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM digital_identities WHERE blockchain_address = '0x123abc'
SELECT id, user_id, public_key FROM digital_identities WHERE public_key LIKE '%ABC%'
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE event = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, request_date FROM verification_requests WHERE status = 'pending' AND request_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT integration_id, blockchain_name FROM blockchain_integration WHERE integration_type = 'public'
SELECT * FROM digital_identities;
SELECT id, wallet_address, blockchain_hash FROM digital_identities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM authentication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT token_id, user_id, expiration_date FROM access_tokens WHERE expiration_date > NOW();
SELECT * FROM digital_identities;
SELECT wallet_address, identity_data FROM digital_identities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, date_trunc('hour', timestamp) AS hour FROM authentication_logs WHERE action = 'LOGIN';
SELECT user_id, request_details->>'verification_type' AS verification_type FROM verification_requests WHERE status = 'pending';
